job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
We are a startup helping solve the problem of financial inclusion.
We are looking for an optimistic and mission driven full stack engineer that ships on time.

Skill set:

React
Mongo
Express
Solidity
Python is a given
Bonus points for GoLang
JavaScript is a given as well

We’re building a couple of different payment solutions and looking for people that can learn quickly!
